Posts.Content: Dorothee, Rebecca and KateG, Thank you so much for your help and support! I went to the breast clinic today at North Manchester hospital. I had an ultrasound followed by a biopsy, results of which came back fine. The staff were all lovely and very caring :) xx
Posts.Title: Worried.... Any help appreciated!

Posts.Content: I'am so glad you are doing well :) you are a very inspiring lady! My appointment is on the 14th, I will let you know how I get on. I'm feeling much more positive already :) Xx
Posts.Title: Worried.... Any help appreciated!

Posts.Content: Dorothee, Thank you for your reply and your kind words, in this situation I think some how ingnorance would be a bonus. I cannot stop thinking about what happened to mum and I know that my family are too and this makes the uncertainty even scarier having seen the effects of BC first hand. I have been told that they don't do mammograms on younger women is this true? X

Posts.Content: Dorothee, Thank you for your reassurance again, I have been struggling for the past few days, wish I had posted earlier lol! :) My best friend is coming with me to my app. How are you? Xx

Posts.Content: Hello :) I'am 27 years old, my mum died of breast cancer 5 years ago, 2 weeks ago I found a hard lump in my left breast in the lower quadrant. My GP also found nodulation, what does this mean? I have received an appointment for the breast clinic, but was wondering what will happen there? I'am understandably scared, any advice will be greatly appreciated. X
